question:
In context with Atacama Desert, which of the following statements are correct?
  1. It passes through 2 countries i.e. Bolivia and Chile
  2. Recently 6 countries along with Europe started programmed named ALMA to observe electromagnetic radiation of sub-millimetre and millimetre wavelengths.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The Atacama Desert is one of the driest places on the Earth lies between Chile and Peru (80% in Chile and remaining in Peru). ALMA (Atacama Large Millimetre/Sub-Millimetre Wavelength Array) is an astronomical interferometer of 66 radio telescope in Atacama Desert of northern Chile which observes electromagnetic radiation of sub-millimetre and millimetre wavelengths. The 6 countries which along with Europe are:
  • Canada
  • USA
  • Taiwan
  • South Korea
  • Japan
  • Chile
Why Chile in news recently? Recently President of India visited Chile during his 3 countries trip from 25th March to 4th April. Some of the key moments of this visit were:
  • India offered training slots to Chilean armed forces in the premier defence institutions of India like Joint Training Warfare Centre in Meghalaya’s Umroi.
  • Chile reiterated towards India’s candidature as permanent member in United Nations Security Council.
  • MoU were signed for Culture Exchange and Mining.
Chile is the 6th largest trade partner of India among Latin American countries. The total trade stands at 2.8 billion USD by 2017-2018. India is focussing to import Lithium from Bolivia and Chile to boost the expansion of Electric Vehicle Industry.
